Arun Gold Coconut Oil

Experience the authentic taste of tradition with Arun Gold Coconut Oil, brought to you by Sri Jayasakthi Edible Oils Pvt. Ltd. Established in 1983, we have spent over four decades perfecting the art of oil extraction to bring you a product that is as pure as nature intended. Our coconut oil is 100% Edible Grade, extracted from the finest quality dried coconuts (copra) to ensure a rich aroma and natural flavor. Packed in a sturdy 5Kg tin to lock in freshness, Arun Gold is the perfect companion for your kitchen, offering versatility for traditional Indian cooking, deep frying, and seasoning.

S

Sri Jayasakthi Edible Oils Pvt. Ltd

Benefits of Arun Gold Coconut Oil

  • Premium Edible Grade: Certified edible grade quality, making it safe and ideal for all types of cooking and consumption.
  • Zero Trans Fats: Contains 0% Trans Fatty Acids, making it a healthier choice for heart-conscious consumers.
  • Rich Energy Source: Packed with 900 Kcal of energy per 100g, providing a dense source of vitality.
  • Legacy of Quality: Manufactured by Sri Jayasakthi Edible Oils, a trusted name in the industry since 1983.
  • Protective Packaging: The 5Kg metal tin ensures the oil remains protected from sunlight and moisture.
  • Versatile Utility: Excellent for cooking and suitable for external applications like hair and skin care.
